overview:
Kirash Infocom was founded in 1996. Kirash is an offshoot of Ishwar Industries Limited, one of the oldest manufacturers of Refractory in India, founded in 1907. The team called “Kirash” creates the magic of coloring and transforming your dreams to virtual reality, a spell that is cast over so many large corporate and big business houses.

We are pleased to introduce Kirash Infocom Pvt Ltd as a company geared for consultation, execution and maintenance of Internet and information technology projects. We have a successful track record of implementing e-commerce solutions, portal designing, computer based presentation and trainings, and host of other value added services. We have successfully developed and maintained software’s for our clients in UK and USA. We develop e-solutions for the biggest and best organisation around the globe. Our clients select us over our competitors because of our ability to build solutions that fit.
